name: Straw Hat Pirates
description: Main protagonist crew seeking One Piece, led by Luffy with 10 core members

name: Straw Hat Grand Fleet
description: Alliance of 7 crews totaling 5640 pirates sworn to aid Straw Hats

name: Red Hair Pirates
description: One of Four Emperors crews, extremely balanced and powerful, inspired Luffy

name: Blackbeard Pirates
description: Yonko crew led by only person with two Devil Fruits, extremely dangerous

name: Big Mom Pirates
description: Yonko crew led by Big Mom with 85 children, focuses on sweets and territory

name: Beasts Pirates
description: Former Yonko crew of 20000 members, defeated in Wano Arc

name: Roger Pirates
description: Legendary crew that reached Laugh Tale and found One Piece, disbanded after Roger's execution

name: Whitebeard Pirates
description: Former strongest crew with 16 divisions, family-like bonds, destroyed at Marineford

name: Heart Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew led by Surgeon of Death, allied with Straw Hats

name: Kid Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew, defeated and likely killed by Shanks near Elbaf

name: Cross Guild
description: Alliance of three former Warlords placing bounties on Marines

name: Revolutionary Army
description: Organization fighting World Government's tyranny, led by Luffy's father Dragon

name: Marines
description: World Government's military force maintaining order across seas

name: World Government
description: Global political authority ruling 170+ nations, created 800 years ago after Void Century

name: Cipher Pol
description: Secret intelligence agency with CP0-CP9 units, handles espionage and assassinations

name: SWORD
description: Secret Marine unit operating independently, includes X Drake as undercover agent

name: Baroque Works
description: Secret organization of 2000+ members attempting Alabasta coup, led by Crocodile as Mr. 0

name: Donquixote Pirates
description: Former Warlord crew that controlled Dressrosa for 10 years using sugar's powers

name: Germa 66
description: Scientific military kingdom, Sanji's family, uses clone soldiers and raid suits

name: Kuja Pirates
description: All-female crew from Amazon Lily, led by former Warlord Hancock

name: Sun Pirates
description: Fishman crew fighting for racial equality, founded by Fisher Tiger

name: Foxy Pirates
description: Crew specializing in Davy Back Fights to win crew members from opponents

name: Arlong Pirates
description: Fishman crew that terrorized East Blue, defeated by Straw Hats at Arlong Park

name: Bellamy Pirates
description: Former allies of Doflamingo, known for mocking dreams of One Piece

name: Buggy Pirates
description: Circus-themed crew that grew massively after Impel Down breakout, now part of Cross Guild

name: Hawkins Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew using fortune telling and voodoo powers, joined Beast Pirates then defeated

name: Bonney Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew led by Bonney with age-manipulation powers

name: Drake Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew, Drake secretly works for Marine SWORD unit

name: Apoo Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew with music-based fighting style, allied with Beast Pirates

name: Bege Pirates
name_japanese: ファイアタンク海賊団
description: Worst Generation mafia-themed crew using Bege's fortress powers

name: Urouge Pirates
description: Worst Generation crew led by Mad Monk from sky island Birka

name: Fallen Monk Pirates
description: Monk-themed crew from sky islands led by Urouge

name: Rumbar Pirates
description: Musical pirate crew that all died except Brook, left their promise at Laboon

name: Krieg Pirates
description: Formerly strongest East Blue crew with 5000 members and 50 ships, defeated by Mihawk

name: Golden Lion Pirates
description: Legendary crew led by Shiki who rivaled Roger, defeated by Roger and Garp

name: Rocks Pirates
description: Legendary crew including young Whitebeard Kaido Big Mom, defeated 38 years ago at God Valley

name: Thriller Bark Pirates
name_japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団
description: Crew using zombie soldiers created by Moria's shadow powers on island-ship

name: New Fishman Pirates
description: Fishman supremacist crew attempting coup of Fishman Island, defeated by Straw Hats

name: Flying Pirates
description: Cursed crew sailing ghost ship that can travel underwater, allied with Hody Jones

name: On Air Pirates
description: Long-arm tribe pirates with sound-based attacks, allied with Kaido

name: Fire Tank Pirates
name_japanese: ファイアタンク海賊団
description: Mafia-themed crew built around Bege's castle devil fruit, briefly allied with Straw Hats against Big Mom

name: Beautiful Pirates
description: Crew of narcissistic prince Cavendish who has split personality (Hakuba), part of Grand Fleet

name: Barto Club
description: Straw Hat fanboy crew led by Bartolomeo with barrier powers, part of Grand Fleet

name: Happo Navy
description: Kung fu themed crew from Kano Country led by Sai, part of Grand Fleet

name: Ideo Pirates
description: XXX Gym Fighting crew led by Ideo the Destruction Cannon, part of Grand Fleet

name: Tontatta Pirates
description: Dwarf tribe crew from Tontatta Kingdom led by Leo, part of Grand Fleet

name: New Giant Warrior Pirates
description: Giant warriors crew aiming to restore Elbaf's glory, part of Grand Fleet, includes Hajrudin

name: Yonta Maria Grand Fleet
description: Massive fleet of thousands from Standing Kingdom led by adventurer Orlumbus, part of Grand Fleet

name: Caribou Pirates
description: Swamp-swamp fruit user's crew known for fake surrenders and murders

name: Macro Pirates
description: Slaver crew capturing merfolk and fishmen, destroyed by Straw Hats

name: Shoujou Pirates
description: Salvage crew using echolocation for treasure hunting, allied with Masira Pirates

name: Masira Pirates
description: Salvage crew working with Shoujou to find underwater treasures

name: Dressrosa
description: Kingdom ruled by Riku family, formerly controlled by Doflamingo for 10 years

name: Alabasta Kingdom
description: Desert kingdom in Grand Line, one of 20 kingdoms that founded World Government

name: Drum Kingdom
description: Snowy island kingdom known for medical expertise, attacked by Blackbeard and Wapol

name: Ryugu Kingdom
description: Underwater kingdom 10000m below surface, ruled by Neptune and royal family

name: Zou
description: Kingdom on back of giant elephant Zunesha, home of Mink Tribe

name: Wano Country
description: Isolated Japanese-themed nation with powerful samurai, freed from Kaido's rule

name: Amazon Lily
description: All-female warrior nation in Calm Belt, birthplace of Boa Hancock

name: Elbaf
description: Legendary kingdom of giants known for world's strongest warriors

name: Tontatta Kingdom
description: Underground kingdom of dwarves with incredible strength despite tiny size

name: Mokomo Dukedom
description: Mink tribe kingdom on Zunesha's back, ruled by cat and dog mink leaders

name: Goa Kingdom
description: Class-segregated kingdom where Luffy grew up, known for Gray Terminal slums

name: Prodence Kingdom
description: Kingdom led by King Elizabello II with King Punch ability

name: Four Emperors
description: Four most powerful pirate captains: currently Luffy Buggy Shanks Blackbeard

name: Seven Warlords of the Sea
description: Former system of 7 powerful pirates allied with World Government, abolished after Reverie

name: Worst Generation
description: 11 supernovas and Blackbeard who emerged around same time, reshaping pirate world

name: CP0
name_japanese: サイファーポールイージスゼロ
description: Strongest Cipher Pol unit serving Celestial Dragons directly, world's greatest intelligence

name: CP9
name_japanese: サイファーポールナンバーナイン
description: Assassin unit using Rokushiki martial arts, defeated by Straw Hats at Enies Lobby

name: Impel Down
description: World's greatest prison with 6 levels of torture, breached by Blackbeard and Luffy
